Package pcrashstatistics

Class DataSearcher

java.lang.Object
pcrashstatistics.DataSearcher
public class DataSearcher
extends java.lang.Object
A class to apply a list of search filters to a data set and return results
Author:
Clayton Davidson

    • searchWithFilters

      public static java.util.ArrayList<VehicleCrash> searchWithFilters​(java.util.ArrayList<VehicleCrash> crashData, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> filters)
      Uses a list of search filters to refine a data set to specific results
      Parameters:
      crashData - Data set to search through
      filters - Search filter strings to be applied
      Returns:
      ArrayList of type VehicleCrash which meet the search requirements

    • applyFilter

      private static boolean applyFilter​(VehicleCrash crash, ColumnData dataIndex, java.lang.String compareType, java.lang.String argument)
      Applies a filter to the data, checking that the data meets the constraints
      Parameters:
      crash - Specific object to check meets requirements
      dataIndex - Category of data to check against
      compareType - Comparison type
      argument - User defined search argument to compare to
      Returns:
      Returns a boolean result to show if the data meets search filters

    • compareValues

      private static boolean compareValues​(int crashValue, java.lang.String comparison, int filterValue)
      Compares a user defined value to an object value where both are integers
      Parameters:
      crashValue - Crash object value
      comparison - Comparison type
      filterValue - User selected value
      Returns:
      Boolean stating if the object value meets the filter requirement

    • compareValues

      private static boolean compareValues​(java.lang.String crashValue, java.lang.String comparison, java.lang.String filterValue)
      Compares a user defined value to an object value where both are Strings
      Parameters:
      crashValue - Crash object value
      comparison - Comparison type
      filterValue - User selected value
      Returns:
      Boolean stating if the object value meets the filter requirement
